bwwExcerpt: The solid Gaines--who also played the voice of reason in recent revivals of Gypsy and 12 ANGRY MEN--knows how to do decency. And Thomas is good as the priggish, misguided mayor who considers himself the town's moral center (though he seems to recede as his character does).
